title: Medieval Village in the Desert
briefDescription: Welcome to Canyonbay, a wonderful place hidden in a bay and pretocted by a huge wall. Each of the few houses has an unique interior, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Canyonbay, a wonderful place hidden in a bay and pretocted by a huge wall. Each of the few houses has an unique interior, even the wall. While not only strolling through the Streets and getting to know friendly people, you may also experience some Adventures and Secrets.
So have fun exploring the city and solving quests and puzzles about the mysterious past of this place!

title: Republic of Saturnistan
briefDescription: The Democratic Republic of Saturnistan is a new country on planet M. This new project, similar to the United States of Urania, but freer, collaborates ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Democratic Republic of Saturnistan is a new country on planet M. This new project, similar to the United States of Urania, but freer, collaborates with those construction lovers who wish to add their creations to this new flat world. Some of the existing constructions have been added from ?Buildings for Minecraft? and therefore I do not claim their authorship. If you want to add whatever you want, download, add and contact me!
PD: This world was born as an experiment to create buildings that would later be copied to my main project United States of Urania (U.S.U)
Saturnistan is a project that has just started this year. Its objective is the creation of a capitalist and collaborative nation.
Currently there is the presidential house, the flag of the country and some basic services.
The city houses a few emblematic and modern skyscrapers
The structure of the city is planned to become a mega city so the streets and sidewalks are large

title: Crimson Zoo
briefDescription: Welcome to Minecraft PE?s #1 zoo!What you seek here isn?t just an ordinary zoo. In that case, Crimson Zoo is the #1 destination for ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
What you seek here isn?t just an ordinary zoo. In that case, Crimson Zoo is the #1 destination for zoos! Started with Worlds for Minecraft by Kayen Works for iOS, we have now moved to the growing MCPEDL!
In Crimson Zoo, you can:
? MEET ANIMALS ? Say hello to over 15+ animals and 2 areas!
? Current areas include:
? Natural Area
? Minecraft Earth Area (used w/ addons)
? PLAY GAMES ? Ranging from animal facts to horse racing, the
zoo also has games too!
? Games include:
? FAX (in demo)
? Horse Racing (in development)
? Hostile Mob Arena (in development)
? CHECK OUT ROOMS ? The lobby, which is where you spawn, features 4 rooms!
? Rooms include:
? Visit: Just visit the zoo!
? Q&A: For almost all of the questions you have!
? Event Room: The event room, which includes the spotlight of
the lastest major update (currently named Comeback
Season)!
? Crimson City: See what the Crimson Development Team has
it?s eyes on it?s current and upcoming project!

title: Spa Castle MCPE [Creation]
briefDescription: Ever heard of or been to this place with the best spa pools and saunas? If not, then this map is for you to explore. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Ever heard of or been to this place with the best spa pools and saunas? If not, then this map is for you to explore. As in real life, Spa Castle MCPE is built for relaxation, comfort and an escape from the ordinary. But for Minecraft, if you?re exhausted from mining, fighting with monsters, or just want some peace & quiet, this map will keep you company whenever you?re taking a break from your other worlds.
There are also an unlimited amount of space surrounding Spa Castle (Since this was built on a flatland world) for you to build your own house, village, or big city. You can either do that, or just simply settle in the spa.
This is based off the Spa Castle in College Point, Queens NY.
Spa Castle first opened on May 12, 2007, given the name ?In Spa World?. In 2012-2013, the name was officially changed to Spa Castle, also following renovation to improve the interior for the guests. I first stepped foot into Spa Castle on February, year of 2016.
Here are some screenshots of Spa Castle MCPE, from outside view to inside view.
Main hall (1st Floor)
The sauna valley
The bar pool
The outdoor pools (Right side view)
The outdoor pools (Left side view)
Aerial view of the outdoor pools (from 3rd floor balcony)
3rd floor hall

The fitness room (3rd floor)
There are more to see, but I?m going to let you see the rest of the areas yourself. The pictures above are some examples of what?s inside.
Some areas and signs are missing, but I?m going to add them in the next update for this map, enjoy.
Some roads outside have been built for you so that you can build your own town around the spa, feel free to expand them.
Notice: this map is only to be uploaded on MCPEDL only! Uploading this map to any other site is forbidden. If any reason shall this map be uploaded to another site other than MCPEDL, please tell me in the comments below immediately, including the site that it?s on!
New Updates!
New directory in lobby.
Added juice bar.
Constructed snack shop and rentals.
Sky Garden Restaurant updated with menu and items.
New locator maps.
New food buffet.
Revised rules in starter shaft.

Added showers near the outdoor pools.
More updates coming soon!
New Updates!
I recently went to Spa Castle on November 29, 2019, and saw changes to the interior. Here are the updates.
New renovated lobby.
Rear sign added (On the back of the building.)
Renovated restrooms on 2nd floor (No Lockers due to space limitation).
New entrances (The right door is closed, as always, whenever I go to Spa Castle, not sure why).
The event room (still the same, since the door was locked when I went to the College Point Spa Castle, so I couldn?t really see what was inside).
The upstairs light is on (on the rooftop floor above the balcony), not sure what is up there)

Here in this real life picture I took at Spa Castle, there?s the rooftop with the light on. I don?t know what?s up there.
The nighttime experience
Staying at Spa Castle during the night was also the best experience for me, so here?s how you can enjoy it too.
Open the chat and commands.
Select the command icon, then the time bar.

title: Desert Lobby Template

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a world that I hope will help map creators make maps ,mainly to do with desert theme or, well a theme which includes sand really. Anyway none the less if you do use this map make sure to credit me. ?
This really took a long time to make and is my very first project so try to actually read instead. This may not be the best looking Template but how many of them are there. Make sure you thank Grian if you think this is a job well done. Thank you for downloading and by the time I posted it will be christmas so Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year

title: Hello, Neighbor! [Prototype] (Multiplayer Battle)
briefDescription: Your neighbor Mr. Peterson looks very suspicious. Sometimes, you hear child screams, grumbles and growls which come from his house. You should check, what's wrong. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Your neighbor Mr. Peterson looks very suspicious. Sometimes, you hear child screams, grumbles and growls which come from his house. You should check, what?s wrong. Sneak into the house and uncover the secret.
One of you plays as Mr. Peterson ? suspisious and creepy neighbor and other plays as Nicky Roth ? lad, that tries to reveal the secret of his basement.

If you play as Nicky Roth, you have only one rule ? get into the basement, but if you play as Mr. Peterson, you must stop Nicky from doing that. Sadly, you must make routine like eating (because of hunger) and going to toilet (because of poison)

title: Over Cross 2
briefDescription: Over Cross 2 is second part/level of the game.The story begins with person getting in a house. Then finds tons of gold, diamond and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Over Cross 2 is second part/level of the game.
The story begins with person getting in a house. Then finds tons of gold, diamond and finds himself trapped in the house.
The second level begins him escaping the house and find the person who is behind all this.

title: Cerul Milionarului ? The Millionaire Sky
briefDescription: This map is a map with a challenge of the past, the completion of the monument, the purpose is to make money and buy the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map is a map with a challenge of the past, the completion of the monument, the purpose is to make money and buy the necessary objects for the monument to complete the map.
The map is in Romanian, partly in English (some words)
On the given map it is possible to use your potential to the full by manifesting your creativity.
Banuti = Money

The map contains two shops (2) one for sale and another for buying items (items).
There is also an island with Random Minecraft Generator, an island where an urn is created where any item you throw in it will pay $ 1 (regardless of itm), there is an island of hell (nether) where you can find Glowstone Generator and Generator of Quartz.

title: Treetops and Temples [Creation]
briefDescription: A long overdue update to this map. playable area has been more than doubled with new tree towers, a new Mayan pyramid, another jungle temple ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A long overdue update to this map. playable area has been more than doubled with new tree towers, a new Mayan pyramid, another jungle temple and new accommodation platforms.
BUILD IS NOW SET TO CREATIVE MODE.

This is a creative build based around a jungle temple which includes an extensive network of treetop platforms and walkways. There are lots of things to see here. For example, in one area there is a Nether Portal which will take you to the Nether not far from a Nether Fortress. There is also a Nether Wart Farm located inside one of the buildings. Basically everything (including resources such as food and weapons) are included which you?ll need for going out and explore!
Creator: keithross39, Twitter Account

title: Modern Estates
briefDescription: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P. map that my sister and I have been developing for months. So far there are about 50+ houses, ...
Description: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P city that has a multitude of attractions such as 50+ heavily detailed houses of all types, apartments, townhouses, city centers with lots of places to theoretically ?go shopping? at, rollercoasters, name-brand fast-food restaurants, cafes and restaurants, schools, and much more. It is important to know that this is NOT A COMPLETE WORLD so there is tons of room for my sister and me to improve and add on to it. We aren?t the most experienced builders so please give us patience while we improve on our building skills. Updates should come a couple of times a month if possible. Our Instagram accounts are L7kee (https://www.instagram.com/l7kee/) and Honeydoq (https://www.instagram.com/honeydoq/). We are constantly trying to improve on this world so please message any concerns to our Instagram accounts mentioned above.

crawledImageUrls.text: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P. map that my sister and I have been developing for months. So far there are about 50+ houses, a couple of apartments and townhouses, two cities with city centers, several strip malls, a multitude of stores, rollercoasters, name-brand fast-food restaurants, theaters, and much more.

briefDescription: A world for honoring people that fought in wars to ensure freedom for everyone. There is a small field and graveyard with poppies, a museum ...

title: Space Shenanigans
briefDescription: Down in Delta, the worker (you), was out to work in a space station, and there was no one around but you and the AI. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Down in Delta, the worker (you), was out to work in a space station, and there was no one around but you and the AI. You are giving missions that are needed to do your job. Space Shenanigans Delta is a map that was originally start by SkyGames, but has been continued by a team called Shapeshift Studios.
#How to play
Follow your compass to guide you to the next objective.

title: Minecraft Tower (Gmod Tower in Minecraft) (World)
briefDescription: Miss the old Gmod Tower? Want a feel for nostalgia that you had from the servers? Then this map is for you, an almost perfect ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Miss the old Gmod Tower? Want a feel for nostalgia that you had from the servers? Then this map is for you, an almost perfect recreation of Gmod Tower in Minecraft. If you miss the classic Gmod Tower server and want a blast to the past, then this map is for you.

title: Google Pac-Man
briefDescription: This map was created to simulate Google Pac-Man (the first result that comes up when you look up Pac-Man on Google Chrome) and was created ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map was created to simulate Google Pac-Man (the first result that comes up when you look up Pac-Man on Google Chrome) and was created by MDJ287 (me) and AlgoCraft (my friend). The original idea came when we were trying to think of what to make in Minecraft, and were originally thinking of normal Pac-Man. Google Pac-Man came up first, though, and we wanted to get started ASAP.
You may change the command blocks in a hole in the grass at the bottom between the yellow O and the ghosts. If you like the changes you made, feel free to leave a comment with your change!

title: Topia Town 1.0
briefDescription: Welcome to Topia Town! You can do anything here, whether you want to live in the residential or the hotel, or are just staying for ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Welcome to Topia Town! You can do anything here, whether you want to live in the residential or the hotel, or are just staying for a day. It doesn?t matter in our happy town! It will get larger with your request as this is 1.0.
This is the entrance to the town, the dock as it?s called.
This is the mine, you can tour it but be careful!

title: Creeper Rain
briefDescription: Tired of the old rain and want something new? Im here to the rescue you with a recreation as a command of a function pack ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Tired of the old rain and want something new? Im here to the rescue you with a recreation as a command of a function pack by Blue Commander, Creeper Rain
How will it work?
You will spawn in a world beside a village and in front of the commands. Climb the ladder and pull the lever to start. Upon realeasing the lever you have 30 seconds before the first wave of Creeper will came crashing down on you. It will then continuelestly rain Creepers every 30 seconds. There will be also green particles above your head spraying down on you.

title: Slime Rancher (Public Beta)
briefDescription: 3 years and this game still hasn't lost it's charm. I've always wondered what it would be like to play slime rancher in Minecraft, and here ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
3 years and this game still hasn?t lost it?s charm. I?ve always wondered what it would be like to play slime rancher in Minecraft, and here we are! Keep in mind this is still in beta and I made this in like 5 days so there will be a lot of bugs. Expect major updates weekly.
Your standard slime! Generates XP every 10000 ticks.
Unlike the actual game, phosphor slimes spawn during the day and can go out in sunlight. Generates XP every 9000 ticks.
Rock slimes are extremely slow, but can hurt you pretty bad with their spikes. Generates XP every 8000 ticks.
The cutest of the bunch, but also the most ferocious. Keep your distance while capturing! Generates XP every 7500 ticks.
The puddle slime is a slime that can only be found on Ring Island. The teleporter to this place can be activated by feeding the tabby gordo [may be broken]. Keep them in the pond at your ranch. Generates XP every 7000 ticks,
While in game they do explode, in this map they do not. Why? Because they would explode and die when you would try and feed them. Generates XP every 6500 ticks.

They pack a punch, then they split! If you?re planning on capturing these guys, split them into their tiny harmless version. Then you?ll have a ton of little money makers! Generates XP every 6000 ticks.
Rad slimes are the best slimes in game for the time being! These will chase you trying to attack you, but they?re pretty harmless. Even their radiation dosn?t do much good. Can be found on ash isle and parts of the Indigo Quarry. Generates XP every 5500 ticks.
Hunter slimes are less rare that rad slimes, but can deal more damage. Can be found in the Moss Blanket. Be careful Generates XP every 5500 ticks.

Honey slimes are semi-rare, only being found in honey perch. Generates XP every 5000 ticks.
When lightning strikes a pink slime, it will turn into a mosaic slime! Useless for the time being.

Two Dispensers can be found east of your ranch house. The left gives you the Vacpack 1.0 and 2.0 while the right gives you elytra. The Vackpac 1.0 shoots tethers at the slimes, while the 2.0 can pick up slimes and push them through things like corral walls.
You can also find a pond and a coop to the right of them. [The button on the coop collects the eggs and places them where shown.]
There are twenty gardens west of your ranch house. This time around you?ll need to find the food in the wild! You can find a golden hoe in your ranch house.

There are two regular corrals, one with an air net, and one with a solar shield. All of them have auto-feeders and XP Collectors. To put slimes in, make sure there is food in the auto-feeder, pick up the slimes with the 2.0, and put them in the corral! A video is shown below on how to do this.

There are two types of gordos, Slime key gordos and static teleporter gordos. Key gordos spawn a key in its mouth when fully fed, and static teleporter gordos activate the nearest red teleporter. Most of the time these teleporters will lead to an island or back to the ranch.

title: Skylands (Long Created World)
briefDescription: About Skylands:Long time world that I've recently made back in 2014, which was way back in the Xbox 360 days. However this map contains all of ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Long time world that I?ve recently made back in 2014, which was way back in the Xbox 360 days. However this map contains all of the builds that me, and my friends built (however some buildings are not finished.) But however, on the grounds, there is lot?s of scraps that me and some other friends left. It?s a lot, and it was shown off on the Minecraft stream multiple times before.
All of the buildings up in the sky are mostly made by me and some friends that I have. It has Sections up to 1, 2, 3 and 4. Some other buildings that are not finished but it?ll be updated in the near feature once more progress is made in Skylands.
However, on the grounds, there are lot?s of scraps that you can check out since me and my friends built some ever since back on the Xbox One days. On the skies, these buildings include the green castle, bounce house, End house and much more, tbh.
And some preview:

title: VoxelSniperPE (World)
briefDescription: Use various customizable tools from the Minecraft: Java Edition mod, VoxelSniper, faithfully recreated in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition using nothing but command blocks. Use the tools ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Use various customizable tools from the Minecraft: Java Edition mod, VoxelSniper, faithfully recreated in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition using nothing but command blocks. Use the tools provided to make a mountain in minutes, detail a cave, make a village, or anything else you can think of!
This world adds 4 useful building tools without the need of addons or resource packs.
Creator: ItzStreamBot/FalselyDev
You can use the brush with your custom brush tip (or you can leave it as the default) to make large detailed structures in minutes. This replaces the snowball (If the machine is on and you have the VoxelSniper tag)
Similar to the brush, but removes blocks instead of adding them. Replaces eggs.
Works the same as the brush, but only gets placed in existing blocks. Replaces splash potions.
Creates a predetermined structure where the Spawner lands. Replaces Bottle o? Enchanting.
Raises selected blocks up 15 blocks. Replaces Ender Pearl.
